category-def.name: org.codehaus.groovy.m2eclipse
category-def.label: Maven integration (optional)
category-def.description: Optional Maven (M2Eclipse) integration for Groovy-Eclipse. These features are targetting the 1.0 version of M2Eclipse and will not install against earlier versions. For that, you must use a different update site: http://dist.codehaus.org/groovy/distributions/greclipse/groovy-m2eclipse/
